name: EventAttackBlock
description: This event is fired when the player left-clicks (attacks) a block. It triggers on the initial click, not when the block is broken.

parameters.name: side
parameters.description: The side being hit. This is a number from 0-5 representing down, up, north, south, west, east

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.

fields.name: block
fields.description: The side being hit. This is a number from 0-5 representing down, up, north, south, west, east
